HomePage_WelcomeMessage_Part1: Welcome to the liveliest platform of Ivano-Frankivsk - the place where everything that makes our city alive and unique comes together!
HomePage_WelcomeMessage_Part2: Want to know where the next exhibition is, where awesome concerts will take place, or where the hottest parties will gather? You’re in the right spot!
HomePage_WelcomeMessage_Part3: We don’t just collect event posters - we catch the city’s spirit, feel every rhythm and moment that can change your day or even your life.
HomePage_WelcomeMessage_Part4: Here you’ll find not only classic exhibitions and concerts but also those offbeat events that official guides won’t tell you about.
HomePage_WelcomeMessage_Part5: Ivano-Frankivsk is a city with soul, where culture and good times go hand in hand. Grab the freshest announcements, plan your weekend. Come in, choose, live brightly - because life’s too short to sit at home.
